name: The Next Two Years
description: What do you think the next two years should be like? A political game about being the next PM during the EU exit (or Brexit) discussions. Take control. In a period of mass debate around the UK, have a say and see how your views would stand up. @NoLevelCap, to tell me what you think about the game, I'd really love to hear - even if you thought it was the worst game you've ever played.
